gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ext
Interface OutputMedium

public interface OutputMedium

An OutputMedium is a class that can present output to the user. The main usage of an output medium is to present errors or other important messages to the user. Visual components as web pages are the obvious candidates for implementing this interface. Screen readers, mailers or any other message based implementation can provide the same functionality.

Method Summary
 void clearMessages()
          Clears the screen from any errors.

          Presents a Throwable.

          Presents a list of messages.
